Key_Ruling: Banks must provide adequate information about currency risk

Case_Name: Arkadiusz Szcześniak v Bank M. SA
Key_Ruling: Banks not entitled to interest on invalidated contracts; consumers can claim compensation
Full restitution required when contract invalid due to unfair currency terms

Case_Name: BNP Paribas Personal Finance SA v VE
Key_Ruling: Currency terms placing disproportionate FX risk on consumers are unfair
Unfair currency clauses can be replaced by national law if contract cannot exist without them

Case_Name: OTP Bank Nyrt v Teréz Ilyés and Emil Kiss
Key_Ruling: Currency risk clauses subject to unfairness assessment; must be transparent

Case_Name: Zsuzsanna Dunai v ERSTE Bank Hungary Zrt
Key_Ruling: National legislation excluding retroactive cancellation is contrary to EU law

Case_Name: ZH, KN v AxFina Hungary Zrt.
Key_Ruling: Leasing agreements with unfair currency terms must be fully invalidated
